data.title: How can I download the pinnacle studio 9 â€¦
data.text:
I am having problem downloading a Pinnacle Studio 9 software into my

Mac pro. It's look like my computer is Unable to read the software. can anyone help?

Mac OS X Lion 10.7.5

4 GB 1333 MHz DDR3

Download it from where? The current version is 18.5.

If you're having problems with it, you should probably contact Pinnacle support. http://corel.force.com/pinnacle?lang=en

The only listing I see for Pinnacle Studio is for v18 and it is not compatible with Macs; it is Windows-only. To run it on Macs, you would have to install Windows via the BootCamp utility ( http://www.apple.com/support/bootcamp/ ) or use a virtual machine software like VM FusionWare fo Parallels.
